intro: Lithocardium hispidum, commonly known as the rough stonecrop, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Crassulaceae and is characterized by its fleshy, succulent leaves and compact growth habit. Lithocardium hispidum is known for its resilience and ability to withstand drought conditions.
